text: usakee neamat ka shukr ada kiya karo tum par usane muradaar aur khoon aur sooar ka gosht aur vah jaanavar jis par (zabaah ke vakt) khuda ke siva (kisee) aur ka naam liya jae haraam kiya hai phir jo shakhsh (maare bhook ke) majaboor ho khuda se sarataapee (naapharamaanee) karane vaala ho aur na (had zarurat se) badhane vaala ho aur (haraam khae) to beshak khuda bakhshane vaala meharabaan hai
